question: the sum of ages of 5 children born 1 year different each is 50 yrs . what is the age of the elder child ?

because he ’ s taxed by his home planet , mork pays a tax rate of 10 % on his income , while mindy pays a rate of 20 % on hers . if mindy earned 3 times as much as mork did , what was their combined tax rate ?

in a lake , there is a patch of lily pads . every day , the patch doubles in size . it takes 25 days for the patch to cover the entire lake , how many days would it take the patch to cover half of the lake ?

a couple who own an appliance store discover that if they advertise a sales discount of 10 % on every item in the store , at the end of one month the number of total items sold increases 25 % . their gross income from sales for one month increases by what percent ?
the present population of a town is 200 . population increase rate is 10 % p . a . find the population of town after 1 years ?

a jar contains only red , yellow , and orange marbles . if there are 3 red , 5 yellow , and 4 orange marbles , and 3 marbles are chosen from the jar at random without replacing any of them , what is the probability that 2 yellow , 1 red , and no orange marbles will be chosen ?
a sports equipment store sold ping pong rackets for a total of $ 490 . if the average ( arithmetic mean ) price of a pair of rackets is $ 9.8 , how many pairs were sold ?
a sum of money at simple interest amounts to rs . 800 in 3 years and to rs . 850 in 4 years . the sum is :
what is the ratio g of the surface area of a cube to the surface area of a rectangular solid identical to the cube in all ways except that its length has been doubled ?
in a neighborhood having 90 households , 11 did not have either a car or a bike . if 22 households had a both a car and a bike and 44 had a car , how many had bike only ?
there are 20 brown dogs , 10 white dogs , 15 black dogs . totally how many dogs are there in all ?

at the faculty of aerospace engineering , 310 students study random - processing methods , 232 students study scramjet rocket engines and 112 students study them both . if every student in the faculty has to study one of the two subjects , how many students are there in the faculty of aerospace engineering ?
when the positive integer x is divided by 9 , the remainder is 5 . what is the remainder when 7 x is divided by 9 ?

salesperson a ' s compensation for any week is $ 210 plus 6 percent of the portion of a ' s total sales above $ 1,000 for that week . salesperson b ' s compensation for any week is 8 percent of b ' s total sales for that week . for what amount of total weekly sales would both salespeople earn the same compensation ?
what amount does an investor receive if the investor invests $ 6000 at 10 % p . a . compound interest for two years , compounding done annually ?
a shop owner sells 30 mtr of cloth and gains sp of 10 metres . find the gain % ?

jack spent 1 / 6 of his lifetime in adolescence . his facial hair started growing after 1 / 12 more of his life . he successfully married his girlfriend diana after 1 / 7 more of his life . their son was born after 5 years from then . the son lived just 1 / 2 of what jack lived . jack dies 4 years after his son died . how long did jack live ?

jose is uploading a file to the internet for a college project . the file weighs 160 megabytes . if jose ' s internet speed for uploading tops 8 megabytes per minute , how long will it take until the upload is completed ?
a shopkeeper forced to sell at cost price , uses a 850 grams weight for a kilogram . what is his gain percent ?

speed of a boat in standing water is 11 kmph and speed of the stream is 2.5 kmph . a man can rows to a place at a distance of 105 km and comes back to the starting point . the total time taken by him is ?
ifaequals the sum of the even integers from 2 to 20 , inclusive , andbequals the sum of the odd integers from 1 to 19 , inclusive , what is the value of ( a + b ) / 2 ?

uncle bruce is baking chocolate chip cookies . he has 50 ounces of dough ( with no chocolate ) and 40 ounces of chocolate . how much chocolate is left over if he uses all the dough but only wants the cookies to consist of 30 % chocolate ?
steve traveled the first 2 hours of his journey at 40 mph and the last 3 hours of his journey at 80 mph . what is his average speed of travel for the entire journey ?
how many integers are between 4 and 88 / 9 , inclusive ?

from january 1 , 1991 , to january 1 , 1993 , the number of people enrolled in health maintenance organizations increased by 15 percent . the enrollment on january 1 , 1993 , was 60 million . how many million people , to the nearest million , were enrolled in health maintenance organizations on january 1 , 1991 ?

train a leaves the station traveling at 30 miles per hour . two hours later train в leaves the same station traveling in the same direction at 42 miles per hour . how many miles from the station was train a overtaken by train b ?
one pipe can fill a tank 3 times as fast as another pipe . if together the two pipes can fill tank in 40 min , then the slower pipe alone will be able to fill the tank in ?
a boat can travel with a speed of 22 km / hr in still water . if the speed of the stream is 5 km / hr , find the time taken by the boat to go 189 km downstream
a train 460 m long is running at a speed of 45 km / hr . in what time will it pass a bridge 140 m long ?
there are 300 employees in a room . 99 % are managers . how many managers must leave the room to bring down the percentage of managers to 98 % ?

in a can , there is a mixture of milk and water in the ratio 3 : 7 . if it is filled with an additional 8 litres of milk the can would be full and ratio of milk and water would become 4 : 7 . find the capacity of the can ?
on a map , 1.5 inches represent 24 miles . how many miles approximately is the distance if you measured 48 centimeters assuming that 1 - inch is 2.54 centimeters ?

a sum of rs . 2691 is lent into two parts so that the interest on the first part for 8 years at 3 % per annum may be equal to the interest on the second part for 3 years at 5 % per annum . find the second sum ?
if 20 % of a number = 100 , then 120 % of that number will be ?

a carpenter constructed a rectangular sandbox with a capacity of 10 cubic feet . if the carpenter made instead a sandbox which was twice as long , twice as wide and twice as high as the original , what would the capacity be of the new larger sandbox ?

two pipes a and b can fill a cistern in 9 and 18 minutes respectively , and a third pipe c can empty it in 24 minutes . how long will it take to fill the cistern if all the three are opened at the same time ?
how many positive integers between 1 and 100 are there such that they are multiples of 13 ?

two trains each 475 m long are running in opposite directions on parallel tracks . their speeds are 55 km / hr and 40 km / hr respectively . find the time taken by the slower train to pass the driver of the faster one ?
if 2 x + y = 7 and x + 2 y = 5 , then 8 xy / 3 = ?

a student took 6 courses last year and received an average ( arithmetic mean ) grade of 100 points . the year before , the student took 5 courses and received an average grade of 60 points . to the nearest tenth of a point , what was the student ’ s average grade for the entire two - year period ?

there are 3 vessels of equal capacity . vessel a contains milk and water in the ratio 7 : 3 ; vessel b contains milk and water in the ratio 2 : 1 and vessel c contains milk and water in the ratio 3 : 2 . if the mixture in all the 3 vessels is mixed up . what will be the ratio of milk and water ?
the speed of a car is 140 km in the first hour and 40 km in the second hour . what is the average speed of the car ?

in a 500 m race , ravi beats ramesh by 5 seconds or 100 m . they decide to run another race and this time ravi gives ramesh a head tart of 200 m . if ravi ’ s speed is twice his previous speed and ramesh ’ s speed is one and half times his previous speed , how far from the starting point should the winning post be so that they finish at the same time ?
how many seconds will a 650 m long train take to cross a man walking with a speed of 3 km / hr in the direction of the moving train if the speed of the train is 48 km / hr ?
the average of 6 observations is 13 . a new observation is included and the new average is decreased by 1 . the seventh observation is ?
the floor of a rectangular room is 20 m long and 12 m wide . the room is surrounded by a veranda of width 2 m on all its sides . the area of the veranda is :

on a certain farm the ratio of horses to cows is 3 : 1 . if the farm were to sell 15 horses and buy 15 cows , the ratio of horses to cows would then be 5 : 3 . after the transaction , how many more horses than cows would the farm own ?
triangle atriangle b are similar triangles with areas 1536 units square and 1734 units square respectively . the ratio of there corresponding height would be
if a square mirror has a 20 - inch diagonal , what is the approximate perimeter w of the mirror , in inches ?
